mapper.select: select g.goods_no,name,filePath || '/' || imgPath mainImg,calorie,allergy,origin,price from Goods g inner join ( select gc.goods_no,gc.sort from goods_category gc where categoryType_no = ( select categoryType_no from ( select rownum rn,s1.* from ( select categoryType_no from category_Type where menuType_no = #{menuType_no} order by menuType_no ) s1 ) s2 where s2.rn = (#{cateRowNum}-1) ) ) s1 on g.goods_no = s1.goods_no inner join goods_Detail gd on g.main_no = gd.goodsdetail_no order by s1.sort
